ygData.subject: Re: Why did you choose to play a paladin?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... To usubscribe or to choose the digest option go to http://www.onelist.com. Enter your email address and your password. Go to the Member Center area. Click
ygData.messageBody:
>Help, need to take my name off mailing list. Trying to do this from home
>page has not helped. Although helpful at times I can not bare to have 40
>something emails at one time. Your assistance is appreciated

To usubscribe or to choose the digest option go to http://www.onelist.com
Enter your email address and your password.
Go to the Member Center area.
Click on the list.
Unsubscribe.

Then to choose the digest option, you can subscribe again to the list and
choose it.

I don't remember if you can change your option without unsubscribing.

Erwin, Paladin of Tunare
Fennin Ro
